title: NWFL : Ogbuchi leaves FC Robo Queens for Edo Queens
body_text:
Sport
NWFL: Ogbuchi leaves FC Robo Queens for Edo Queens
Edo Queens have added Chidinma Ogbuchi to their squad ahead of the 2025-26 Nigeria Women Football League, NWFL, season.
Ogbuchi joined the former NWFL champions from FC Robo Queens.
She is the latest addition to the coach Moses Adukuâ€™s squad.
DAILY POST reports that Edo Queens announced the signing of seven new players this week.
Edo Queens are hoping to reclaim the title they lost to Bayelsa Queens last season.
They will kick-start their campaign with a clash against defending champions Bayelsa Queens.
